name: US Army Transport Sim
description:
Imagine yourself as rough terrain military truck driver at the border line check post of the national army. Suddenly a war is started with the neighboring country. So it’s time to prove your skill of truck speed driving and precision in army game i.e. truck driving game. You have to pick soldiers from the base camp control speed and transport to the final destination. There is a long distance you have to cover between army trucks parking to the check post at border. So drive truck at furious speeds and race truck on roads to complete your target in time.
FEATURES

• Challenging off-road truck drive.
• Free to play game specially designed
• Real mountain HD graphics.
• Mission based challenging game.
